caption.p: Metagenome composition before and after genome finishing. Red bars: Percentage of reads of the metagenome assigned to target genome after similarity searches and before genome finishing. Blue bars: Percentage of reads of the metagenome assigned to target genome after genome finishing strategies were applied to the target genome. DRV, dolphin rhabdovirus; RFFRV, red fox fecal rhabdovirus; PNV, python nidovirus.
